Description: On I-95 at mile marker 63 in the County of Chesterfield, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On Rt. 660 in the County of Campbell, in the vicinity of Eastbrook Rd; Wood Ln; Rt. 665E/W (Campbell County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Closed
